## 14. WATER
### Definition
Sweet water, good for drinking. Should be kept apart from more specialized terms: ‘salt water’ (= ‘sea (water)’), ‘foul water’, ‘running / flowing water’ (= ‘stream’, ‘river’), etc. (GLD)

### Contexts
1. People cannot live without water. (GLD) 2. He is drinking water. (GLD) 3. She dipped some water in her jug. (GLD)
